category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_PREVENT_TASK_START_UPDATE_STATES
preference.preference_description: Prevents the changing of the start date of the tasks with the specified state. After you change this preference's value, you must log off and then log on for it to take effect. Valid Values: Accepts one or more of the following internal state values: in_progress complete closed aborted
